alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ada and east central Canyon Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 429 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Lowell, or near Caldwell, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Nampa, Caldwell, Huston and Lake Lowell around 430 PM MDT. Meridian, Eagle and Star around 450 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley
